game.title: Covert Commando
game.synopsis: The game takes place in a city where the player is a covert commando sent on a dangerous mission. They must complete a number of tasks to advance and uncover the terrorists' plot before the organization launches a deadly counter-attack.
game.beginning: You are deployed into the heart of the city, receiving your first assignment from headquarters...
game.ending: With skill and precision, you dismantle the terrorist organization, preventing the catastrophic attack. The city is saved, and justice prevails.
